name: Sugar (Handkor)
description:
In a world made of candy, set off on a quest to become the worlds competitive pachinko champion.

Fight candy creatures and TRANSFORM their remains into various balls to help you win your pachinko matches.

Journey to each city in the land and defeat their champion. Once all champions are defeated, you will be crowned the winner.

Overworld Controls:

 WASD: Move

Left mouse button: Trigger Actions

TAB: Ball Distribution Menu

Battle Controls:

W/D chose between Attack or Run

Left mouse button or spacebar to accept selection

Pachinko Controls:

WASD: Select your ball type

Hold mouse button or spacebar: Shoot balls

Move mouse left and right to adjust the launcher's power.

All content was created during the jam except for:

Music and Animations
